ctk_dma_list_t Struct Reference

#include <ctk_spu_dma_list.h>

ls_addr_t ls_base
ea_addr32_t ea_base
unsigned int nelems

Detailed Description

DMA list structure for up to 16 DMA list elements. (In most cases it should suffice since; with each DMA list element we can transfer 16Kb, therefore in total 16 elements can transfer 16Kb * 16 = 256K bytes of memory (= LS size).)

Field Documentation

ea_addr32_t ctk_dma_list_t::ea_base

32-bit EA Hi addr
